Russo</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <A NAME=HEADING38></A> <A HREF="AR95Book-39.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-37.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-39.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-37.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> <IMG SRC="images/russo.gif"><P> <A NAME=HEADING38-0></A> <H1> <A NAME=MARKER-9-69></A><A NAME=MARKER-10-70></A>Vincent F. Russo</H1> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> <EM> Assistant Professor of Computer Sciences (1990)</EM><P> <EM> B.S., computer science/physics, University of Dayton, 1984; M.S., computer science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 1987; Ph.D., 1991.</EM><P> Dr. Russo's general research interests include operating systems, programming languages (especially object-oriented design/programming), computer security and computer networking. His current specific areas of research include applying object-oriented design techniques to the design and construction of distributed operating systems, distributed object systems, garbage collection algorithms for non-cooperative distributed programming environments, type systems for object-oriented programming languages, and campus-wide wireless internetworking.<P> Projects: <A HREF=AR95Book-82.html>Crosspoint Project</A>, <A HREF=AR95Book-120.html>The Renaissance Object-Oriented Operating System</A>, <A HREF=AR95Book-121.html>Garbage Collection for Object-Oriented Software</A>, <A HREF=AR95Book-122.html>Module Constructs for Object-Oriented and Functional Languages</A><P> <A HREF="http://www.cs.purdue.edu/people/russo"> Russo's home page </A><P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <ADDRESS>CS Annual Report - 19 APR 1996</ADDRESS> <A HREF="AR95Book-39.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-37.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-39.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-37.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
